name: Apocalypse - Defenders of Adacan 3
description:
Part 3 (Apocalypse) of Defenders of Adacan

Semi, Ishya and Anzu goes out to meet the invading army of Nezaktiths.

Point-and-click adventure in the city state Adacan in Mesopotamia about 2.500 BCE.

Part 1 (the Ascent) here
